name: user-auth-template
description: A reusable user authentication system template built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This template provides a complete user management system with features like registration, login, password reset, and role-based access control.

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
